# Archived Documentation

This directory contains historical debugging and investigation documentation that is no longer actively used for AI agent guidance.

## Archived Files

**Debugging and Investigation Notes:**
- `DEBUG_MENU_TESTING.md` - Menu testing debug notes
- `DIAGNOSTIC_INSTRUCTIONS.md` - Mac hang diagnostic instructions
- `MAC_DEBUGGING_GUIDE.md` - macOS-specific debugging guide
- `INVESTIGATION_SUMMARY.md` - Investigation findings summary
- `MAC_INSTALL_FIX_SUMMARY.md` - macOS installation fix documentation
- `MAC_TERMINAL_HANG_FIX.md` - macOS terminal hang fix details
- `TEST_ZSH_FIX.md` - zsh-specific test fixes
- `HANDLE_COMMAND_NOT_FOUND_TOGGLE.md` - Command not found handler documentation

These files were moved to archive as part of the AI documentation consolidation effort to reduce verbosity and improve AI agent compliance with project standards.

**Note:** `SPIRAL_DEBUG.md` remains in the parent directory as it documents an active project.

## Current AI Documentation

For current AI-facing documentation, see:

1. **`.AGENTS.md`** - Quick reference for AI agents (205 lines)
2. **`.github/copilot-instructions.md`** - Main Copilot guide (303 lines)
3. **`.github/instructions/*.md`** - Topic-specific detailed guides (referenced, not duplicated)

Total primary AI documentation: ~508 lines (down from ~3,871 lines)
